basics.name: Christian Joudon
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: Currently pursuing a Computer Science degree at the University of Hawaii at Manoa with an expected graduation in Fall 2024. My academic background began in Biochemistry, granting me a deep understanding of chemistry and biology. Coupled with diverse experiences ranging from roles in the restaurant sector to filmmaking and creative endeavors, I'm equipped with strong communication and analytical skills. As I continue my journey in Computer Science, I aim to blend my creativity, analytical expertise, and industry insights to make a significant impact in the field.

work.summary: Took time to finish screenplay, and start work on novel and short stories. Extended time off due to COVID.

Managed residential real estate building projects. Collaborated with architects, drafters, builders, and interior designers. Managed budgets and deadlines using Excel. Organized and maintained a small business farm and orchard.
Provided excellent customer service as a server and bartender in a busy restaurant setting.
Performed front-of-house duties and evening bookkeeping.
Stocked, cleaned, prepared food, and provided customer service.
Served customers in a fast-paced restaurant environment.
Trained multiple employees and overhauled the Cold Bar recipe book using Excel cost sheets.
